entity.name: Tokyo Olympic medal design set to be revealed
entity.description: Tokyo 2020 will unveil the design of their Olympic medals at a One Year to Go Ceremony at the Tokyo International Forum.

data.text:
Congratulations to Florian Brungraber for winning the silver medal in Tokyo! We were beyond happy to welcome you and your teammates onboard again. We hope you had a pleasant flight with us, @npc_austria! 🇦🇹🏆🇯🇵

#Servus #WeAreAustrian #ParalympicTeamAustria #Tokyo2020 https://t.co/Rczs1poOmP

@martinrrdot Dear Martin, please send your inquiry via the web form https://t.co/hiamZCHAO2 to the respective department. 
Thank you. Kind regards, Ivana

urls.title: Enquiry about vouchers
urls.description: Have you won a competition or do you have questions about a voucher? Get in touch and we will be happy to provide information for your specific situation.

@pvanloij @SOFIAirport Hi Patrick, check-in for short hall flights usually starts 2 hours before departure. 
Kind regards, Sarah

data.text: @vinewood666 Hi, at the moment we don't plan any cancellations since this is just a travel warning. Best regards, Karin
@29simosimo Hi, es tut uns sehr leid, dass dein Gepäck noch nicht bei dir ist. Bitte sende deine Anfrage direkt an https://t.co/WBd3FgJtcg.vie@austrian.com. LG Karin

@JulioCotta @flughafen_wien Hello Julio, are you holding an Austrian Airlines ticket? Then please fill out this online form: https://t.co/pasAIhUlip
Our colleagues will have a closer look into this matter and will get back to you. Kind regards, Sara

urls.title: Help & Contact
urls.description: Do you have any questions about your reservations, your flight or your baggage? Contact us via our contact form. We will be happy to help you.

data.text: @schuchalexander Hallo Alex, hast du denn schon vorab deine Dokumente hochgeladen? Liebe Grüße, Sarah
@schuchalexander @WolfgangMueckst [6/6] Darüber hinaus können weitere Kontrollen direkt im Terminal oder am Gate durchgeführt werden.

@schuchalexander @WolfgangMueckst [5/6]werden vom Bodenpersonal Corona-relevante Dokumente abgefragt. Für einige Destinationen können Passagiere ihre Dokumente schon vorab online hochladen. Falls die hochgeladenen Dokumente noch nicht überprüft wurden, prüft ein Boarding Agent die Dokumente bei Boarding erneut.

@schuchalexander @WolfgangMueckst [4/6] Die Kontrolle von Corona-relevanten Dokumenten hängt somit vom jeweiligen Zielort ab. Beim Online-Check-in oder am Check-in-Automaten muss der Passagier bestätigen, dass alle Einreisebestimmungen erfüllt sind. Wenn der Passagier beim Check-in Gepäck aufgibt,

@schuchalexander @WolfgangMueckst [3/6] warten und nicht positiv getestet wurden. Alle Passagiere werden zudem gebeten, sich vor dem geplanten Reiseantritt stets über die aktuellen Reise- und Einreisebeschränkungen des Ziellandes und möglicher Transitpunkte zu informieren, da sich diese kurzfristig ändern können

@schuchalexander @WolfgangMueckst [2/6] Welche Dokumente erforderlich sind, wird daher nicht von der Fluggesellschaft festgelegt. Dennoch bitten wir alle Passagiere beim Check-in zu bestätigen, dass sie in den letzten 14 Tagen keinen Kontakt zu einem Covid-19-Fall hatten, nicht auf ein ausstehendes Testergebnis

@schuchalexander @WolfgangMueckst [1/6] Hallo Alex, grundsätzlich ist Austrian Airlines als Fluggesellschaft nicht dazu verpflichtet, Corona-bedingte Nachweise zu verlangen, um eine Reise anzutreten. Abhängig vom Ziel- bzw. Transitland kann es jedoch zu länderspezifischen Einreisebestimmungen kommen.
@gatchaking @unsereoebb  Hi, please apologize the inconvenience. We hope you'll be reunited soon. Best regards, Susi

@marcringeling  Hi,we're sorry that your bags were missed for 5days.Please apologize the inconvenience.Unfortunately our colleagues are not allowed to pay any compensation without invoices as each payment has to be documented.Thank's for your https://t.co/hfRPv1gBh0 regards, Susi

data.text: @EvanI64 @Expedia Hi Evan, we are sorry to learn that your wife was affected by flight cancelation. Please send us the booking code and your request in a DM. We´ll have a look at this matter. Kind regards, Derya https://t.co/3NgZx6Sh8s

data.text: @BramZnl Hi Bram, we are sorry that you are facing difficulties sending us your request. Please try to use a different browser (Chrome, Firefox..) and also empty your cache. Maybe this helps. Kind regards, Derya

@ZaraLeSueur Hi, the rebooking period was extended - you can rebook now until October 31st. For which date do you want to rebook? You can also send us your new flights via DM so that we can have a closer look. Best regards, Susi

@birmpoutsoukis @unsereOEBB @aviapartnerF Hi Theo, sorry to hear your bag did not arrive with you. You can contact us as well via this e-mail address https://t.co/WBd3FgJtcg.vie@austrian.com. Kind regards, Christine

@EstebanHubertus @sebastiankurz @akk @WKOe Hi Esteban, das Flugzeug als Transportmittel zählt zu den Massenbeföderungsmitteln hier darf der Sicherheitsabstand gemäß Verordnung auch unterschritten werden. Liebe Grüße, Christine

@abdullah896909 @FCZoryaOfficial @skrapid Hi,we as an Airline do not ask for a negative test to board the plane,unless it is an entry requirement for your destination. Please contact the respective authorities to get the needed information.Kind regards, Christine
@rickmoyer76 [2/2] Schalter direkt am Flughafen, um die Dokumentenprüfung im Zuge deines Check-in vorzunehmen. Unsere KollegInnen helfen dir gerne weiter. Liebe Grüße, Christine

@rickmoyer76 [1/2] Hi, es tut uns leid, dass du Schwierigkeiten mit dem Upload deiner Dokumente hattest.  Sollte der Prozess nicht abgeschlossen werden können wende dich bitte direkt an unsere Check-in
@futureLay Hi there, certain bookings cannot be rebooked online. If there's anything we can assist you with, please send us a DM with your booking details. Kind regards, Ivana

@hofrat Hi Clemens, Eine Namensänderung ist nach den Austrian Airlines Richtlinien nicht erlaubt. Unter bestimmten Voraussetzungen (Schreibfehler bis zu 2 Buchstaben oder Namensänderung durch Heirat) ist diese aber gegen eine Gebühr von EUR 25 möglich. LG Karin

@Leightons_pics Hi there, we’re very sorry about the inconvenience during your journey. Please turn to the contact on your PIR. It is where all information about your case is collected. The contact person there will be glad to assist you. Kind regards, Ivana
@josefholm Hi Josef, laut dem Posting vom Flughafen Wien kam es aufgrund eines Software Fehlers zu der Sperre - die Flughafen Wien AG entschuldigt sich bei allen betroffenen Passagieren. LG Karin

@Janniebee73 Dear Jan, the flight via Frankfurt today is available, however charges will apply. I therefore kindly ask you to contact our service counter in Vienna to rebook your flight. Kind regards, Ivana
@AlexandreGhis Hi there, there's no DM address. You just send us a direct message on Twitter not a PM on FB. Sorry about the waltz but all our channels are pretty busy. Kind regards, Ivana
@AlexandreGhis Dear Alexandre, we're sorry for any inconvenience caused. If there's anything we can asisst your with, please send us a DM with your booking details. Kind regards, Ivana
@Janniebee73 @wizzair Hi Jan, please mind that jump seats are only available for crew members. Kind regards, Christine
@AllEliteJim Hi Jim, this is our US service number  +1 516296 9650. Kind regards, Christine
@legallois Hi, our Business Class Lounge will reopen on August 30th, 2021. Kind regards, James
@TunaTamer Hi Anthony, unfortunately we do not have any news about Boston. Kind regards, Ivana
@paulkgb Hi Paul, we regret reading about this unfortunate situation. Please send us your booking code in a DM so we can take a closer look. Kind regards, Chris
@janniebee73 @wizzair  Hi, thanks for this lovely feedback. Have a nice flight tomorrow. Best regards, Susi
@RymMomtaz Hi there, please send us your booking code and your requested change in a DM so we can take a closer look. Kind regards, Chris
@maxledaron Hi Max, please send us your booking code and your new required flight details in a DM so we can take a closer look. Kind regards, Chris
@Janniebee73 Hi Jan, thank you please send us your booking code in a DM and also send us the correct name. We´ll take a closer look into it.  Kind regards, Derya

data.text:
What an exciting match against @FCZoryaOfficial and congratulations on winning, @skrapid! 🥳 Thank you for travelling with Austrian Airlines and we hope you had a pleasant stay on board. ⚽🛫

#Servus #AustrianAirlines #Rapid #SKRapid #SCR2021 #UEL https://t.co/otwoA4SqtW
@AllEliteJim Hi Jim, please provide us your booking code or ticket number and advise your seat preference. We'll have a closer look at your reservation. Kind regards, James
@HiDorli Hallo Doris, der Flughafen Karpathos hatte einen Ausfall der Navigationshilfe, daher musste unser Flug auf heute 09:25 verschoben werden. Liebe Grüße, Derya
@BelgiumTraveler Hi, please send us in a DM the flight number/date or your boking code in order to investigate things further. Kind regards, Christine

We are keeping our fingers crossed for the upcoming match against FC Zorya Luhansk, @skrapid! ✊🏼 Our crew is happy to have you on board and make it a successful journey! ⚽🛫

#Servus #AustrianAirlines #Rapid

@BuqeOsmani Hi there, we apologize for any inconvenience caused. In case the request has not been solved in the meantime, please send us the booking code and the new required flight details in a DM so we can take a closer look. Kind regards, Chris

data.text: @wodkamichi Hi Michael, please try to use a different browser (e.g. google chrome). Kind regards, Christine
@BuqeOsmani Hi, we are sorry for the inconvenience. Please mind that our telephone lines are currently overloaded. Kind regards, Christine
@thebalkanpress [2/2] Our colleagues will have a closer look at your case and will come back to you as soon as possible. Kind regards, Derya

@thebalkanpress [1/2] Hi there, we regret to hear that your baggage was not delivered in good condition and apologize for any inconvenience this has caused. In order to submit a claim please use the following link https://t.co/qcH9UxZn57.
